parameters.name: BizType
parameters.description: Business type. No more than 64 characters.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The current page number being queried.

parameters.name: DeviceId
parameters.description: A unique ID generated by the real-person authentication server for the access party's device. This ID is only generated after the device has been successfully activated and can be obtained through the getLicenseExtraInfo function in the offline facial recognition SDK.

parameters.name: ExpiredEndDay
parameters.description: The end time of the query, i.e., querying authorizations that will expire between ExpiredStartDay and ExpiredEndDay.

parameters.name: ExpiredStartDay
parameters.description: The start time of the query, i.e., querying authorizations that will expire between ExpiredStartDay and ExpiredEndDay.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: Number of items per page in the query.

parameters.name: UserDeviceId
parameters.description: No more than 64 characters, defined by the access party, which can be used to identify a specific device.
